bug.author: hazardwayne
bug.summary: Training a Text Classification Model meet "GRU" key error
bug.description:
Describe the bug KeyError: 'GRU'
Following the tutorial at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/TUTORIAL_5_DOCUMENT_EMBEDDINGS.md>https://github.com/zalandoresearch/flair/blob/master/resources/docs/TUTORIAL_5_DOCUMENT_EMBEDDINGS.md</denchmark-link> , i encountered KeyError: 'GRU' when predicting. Expected behavior I have updated flair version, directly restoring model raises with this error, but about 2 months ago everything is ok.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45623193/67078424-d9698a00-f1c3-11e9-9bdb-6ca93de881f1.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS [e.g. iOS, Linux]: centos Version [e.g. flair-0.3.2]: flair-0.4.2 with error
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hazardwayne>@hazardwayne</denchmark-link> could you try this with Flair 0.4.4? This was just released.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
